nodes.text: Rullag was an astronomical object located in the Cadma sector of the Outer Rim Territories. Dark Jedi Nax Cirvan claimed to have killed eight Jedi and their Padawans on the plains of Rullag during the Clone Wars.

Rullag was first mentioned in the 2012 comic book Darth Vader and the Ghost Prison 4. However, the comic did not specify if Rullag was the name of a planet, a moon or some other type of astronomical object.
